query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		experiencebyowaspcategories {
			a10_flags,
			a10_submissions,
			a1_flags,
			a1_submissions,
			a2_flags,
			a2_submissions,
			a3_flags,
			a3_submissions,
			a4_flags,
			a4_submissions,
			a5_flags,
			a5_submissions,
			a6_flags,
			a6_submissions,
			a7_flags,
			a7_submissions,
			a8_flags,
			a8_submissions,
			a9_flags,
			a9_submissions,
			id,
		}
	}
